title: Clipped
description: She must regain her memories or lose her love forever.After defeating her crazed fiancé from the Bolentia Realm, Trinity and her human love, Jayden, are finally enjoying a quiet life at his isolated cabin while she learns how to exist on Earth, despite her still missing memory. But when Jayden’s artistic success leads them to New York, they unknowingly stumble into a city plagued with nefarious scientists bent on exploiting supernatural creatures like Trinity.Caught in the middle of a desperate interstellar battle between humans and other Realm beings like herself, Trinity must tap into the deeply buried instincts as a super-skilled Bolentian Guard or lose everything she’s come to love.The Winged Trilogy can be read as stand alone novels, but they are best enjoyed in order:Book 1: CROSSEDBook 2: CLIPPEDBook 3: CROWNED
author: Lynn Rush
